entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
